text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Coward Bone Spurs Trump lied again!

G'damn it!

He has to stop doing that!

Day after day after day, lie after lie after lie, 

America is sick and tired of it!

Trump promised ‘anybody’ can get coronavirus testing https://t.co/T1MFUo9wXF
